content:
Prev: Bubble houses Up: Museu d'Art Contemporani Next: Soldier ball

Dancers



A large crowd gathered in the plaza outside the museum to watch this performance, which mostly consisted of the woman in the black outfit running and dancing around while the other performers wrapped themselves in towels. We had a pretty good view from the ramps connecting the floors of the museum.
Taken Saturday, September 15, 2001, 06:44:46pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 420kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/30s @ F7.0, ISO 100, 252mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 45:20 - 80:65 - 215:235 - 255:255, USM 20:100 - 20:20 - 30:4 - 100:0.5
